channel.title: My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content on My New Hugo Site

item.title: message
item.description: Hey, You got a {{messageType}} {{ message }} From: {{ email }}

item.title: StatusChange
item.description: Your {{type}} got {{status}} Your {{type}} with title "{{postTitle}}" got {{status}} View {{type}} We're here to help if you need it. You can directly mail us at hey@helppie.me or contact us.

item.title: limitCrossed
item.description: It's time to upgrade! Unfortunately, you have exceeded your monthly messages limit, you have to upgrade to see the new messages Upgrade Now If you have any question, you can directly mail us at hey@helppie.me

item.title: newComment
item.description: 1 You got a new comment on your post {{ name }} commented on your post {{postTitle}}, click on below button to check it out View Comment If you think this is a spam, you can directly mail us at hey@helppie.me or contact us.

item.title: newPost
item.description: 1 You got a {{postType}} on {{productName}} Click on below button to check it out View {{postType}} If you think this is a spam, you can directly mail us at hey@helppie.me or contact us.

item.title: confirm
item.description: You have to verify your email to start receiving emails from your widget If you think this is spam, please ignore the email Verify Email We're here to help if you need it. You can directly mail us at hey@helppie.me or contact us. – Arvind at helppie.me

item.title: welcome
item.description: Thanks for joining Helppie.me Hey {{name}}, You are all set to get feature suggestions, bug reports for your products Add Your Product We're here to help if you need it. You can directly mail us at hey@helppie.me or contact us. – Arvind at Helppie.me
